column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Daniela - Thank you for your review. I'm very concerned to hear about your experience at JINYA. Can you provide more details regarding your visit
column2: such as the date and approximate time you dined with us
column3: and in what way(s) our service was bad? We always appreciate the positive reviews
column4: but it's the one-star reviews that help us improve our station. I look forward to hearing from you.
